00020 /* \file MessageStream.h Provides a base class for streaming messages from a component to its calling function. */
00021 
00022 #ifndef _MessageStream_HEADER_
00023 #define _MessageStream_HEADER_
00024 
00025 #include <cstring>
00026 #include <string>
00027 //
00028 
00029 /*! Provides a base class definition for streaming back messages to the parent process. */
00030 class MessageStream
00031 {
00032 protected:
00033         /*! The level of messages to display. Larger number equals more messages. */
00034         int verbosity;
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00038         /*! Constructor */
00039         MessageStream() { verbosity = 0; }
00040 
00041   virtual ~MessageStream() { }
00042 
00043         /*! Set the level of verbosity desired. 0 == no messages
00044          * 1 == normal messages, 2,3,4, etc. == more verbose.
00045          * @param level - level of verbosity desired.
00046          */  
00047         void SetLevel(int level) { verbosity = level; }
00048 
00049         /*! Get the level of verbosity desired. 0 == no messages
00050          * 1 == normal messages, 2,3,4, etc. == more verbose.
00051          * @return current level of verbosity
00052          */  
00053         int GetLevel() const { return verbosity;}
00054 
00055         /*! Send a message.
00056          * @param level - level of verbosity desired.
00057          * @param msg The message to send.
00058          */
00059         virtual void Write(int level, const std::string &msg) = 0;
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif
